targets.query: SELECT mean("total_steps") FROM (SELECT sum("steps") AS "total_steps" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter group by time(1h))
SELECT mean("heart_rate") AS "mean_heart_rate" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE heart_rate < 254 and $timeFilter
SELECT max("heart_rate") AS "mean_heart_rate" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE heart_rate < 254 and $timeFilter
SELECT sum("steps") AS "total_steps" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT max("heart_rate") AS "max_heart_rate" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE heart_rate < 254 and $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("intensity") AS "Activity Intensity" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter group by time($interval)

panels.description: Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI) score points earned today - https://www.ntnu.edu/cerg/personal-activity-intelligence
panels.title: PAI Earned Today

panels.description:
The average intensity score for activities.

There's an explanation of the score meanings at https://support.zepp.com/en/faq/153

panels.description:
The average intensity score for activities.

There's an explanation of the score meanings at https://support.zepp.com/en/faq/153
panels.title: Max Activity Intensity

targets.query: SELECT sum("High") as "High", sum("Low") as "Low", sum("Moderate") as "Moderate" FROM (SELECT last("time_high") AS "High",  last("time_low") AS "Low", last("time_moderate") AS "Moderate"  FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d))

panels.title: Percentage of Time spent at each PAI Threshold

targets.query: SELECT max("time_high") AS "High",  max("time_low") AS "Low", max("time_moderate") AS "Moderate"  FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: Time spent at each PAI Threshold

panels.description: The average stress score outside of configured sleeping hours
panels.title: Mean Stress Score Exc. Sleeping Hours

panels.description: The average stress score outside of configured sleeping hours
panels.title: Max Stress Score Exc. Sleeping Hours

targets.query: SELECT mean("stress") AS "stress" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("stress") AS "stress" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter group by time($interval)

SELECT sum("stress_level_counter_unknown") AS "unknown",  sum("stress_level_counter_relaxed") AS "relaxed", sum("stress_level_counter_normal") AS "normal",  sum("stress_level_counter_medium") AS "medium", sum("stress_level_counter_high") AS "high" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter

panels.title: Time spent at each stress level

targets.query: SELECT sum("stress_level_counter_unknown_exc_sleep") AS "unknown",  sum("stress_level_counter_relaxed_exc_sleep") AS "relaxed", sum("stress_level_counter_normal_exc_sleep") AS "normal",  sum("stress_level_counter_medium_exc_sleep") AS "medium", sum("stress_level_counter_high_exc_sleep") AS "high" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."gadgetbridge" WHERE  $timeFilter

panels.title: Time spent at each stress level (Excluding sleep)
